CONVERSATION GROUP: VO Note: Dalanir reading a letter from another man.
BK WOTC I saw you speaking with Illydia. I have seen this list of hers. Names of drow slaves whom Tezzarae hoped to save? And yes, I have heard of Lady Zinsianna.

Bk because->became // WOTC Tasyllys sought out a powerful patron, giving himself over to the study of dark magics. I could sense his soul's corruption, even from the beginning. He became rougher, meaner, more impatient, more... unpredictable.

BK rephrased from "Eventually, I came to fear him. I confronted him, and he nearly killed me in his rage. I fled on my own, searching for a way to the surface, and I fell into the arms of Bregan D'Aerthe, who promised protection in return for service."
WOTC My sister would have succeeded had it not been for my eldest brother. He used his fledgling magic to shield me and he placed me under his protection.
My dear sister was more than willing to carry out Lolth's will. Moments after my birth, Talisstra took me by my shoulders to dash my skull against the wall.

BK I cut "Eavesdropping is my magical specialty!" because the actual question was how he saw the list. Which does not involve eavesdropping... he was actually answering a different question "How had he hearda bout Lady Znsianna"
Bk cut the duplicate "from our quest "
